message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $130, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $130, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to consider $125?
